*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel Norris to Austin, October 3, 1826. Conditions in east Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-03-1826">October 3rd 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Steven F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir I recd your letter of the *date_mentioned n="09-10-1826">10th*/date_mentioned* wherein you state I missunderstood your meaning about gains if I did I am quite happy to say I am truely glad as I know he has stated nothing against those *person_mentioned*inhabitants */person_mentioned*except he has pass it round this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*and I know him to be a man of more sense he has his *person_mentioned*enemys */person_mentioned*as we all have his reports to Government has been in their favour of them *person_mentioned*inhabitants */person_mentioned*untiil they came out in a verry singular way and then he did not report them*/p*
*p*you say as you have informed you must know any person disapointed will be offended hear boath sides then you can better Judge*/p*
*p*sir you may with all confidence say any thing that may be for the good of the *person_mentioned*inhabitants */person_mentioned*of either place*/p*
*p*I can inform you that the *person_mentioned*Cheriches [Cherokees]*/person_mentioned* has obtained permition to go and fight the *person_mentioned*hostile Indians*/person_mentioned* and suppose they will be soon of [f] in pesuit of them if they if any quantity should go I will let you know*/p*
*p*Sir you may at all times with all confidence I will assist your recommended *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*in [any way] I can that is in my power acording to law*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel Norris */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
